00026 class RegisterOmiscidService : public RegisterService
00027 {
00028 public:
00029     RegisterOmiscidService( const SimpleString FullName, uint16_t ePort, bool AutoRegister = false );
00030      RegisterOmiscidService( const SimpleString ServiceName, const SimpleString Domain, uint16_t ePort, bool AutoRegister = false );
00031 
00032     // Virtual destructor always
00033     virtual ~RegisterOmiscidService();
00034 
00035 private:
00036     void Init( bool AutoRegister );
00037 };

00039 class WaitForOmiscidServices : public WaitForDnsSdServices, public CommonServiceValues
00040 {
00041 public:
00042     WaitForOmiscidServices();
00043     virtual ~WaitForOmiscidServices(void);
00044 
00045     int NeedService( const SimpleString eName, IsServiceValidForMe eCallBack = NULL, void * eUserData = NULL )
00046     {
00047         return WaitForDnsSdServices::NeedService( eName, GetOmiscidServiceDnsSdType(), eCallBack, eUserData );
00048     }
00049 
00050     // If we do not plan to filter with the name, ask for all services
00051     int NeedService( IsServiceValidForMe eCallBack, void * eUserData = NULL )
00052     {
00053         return WaitForDnsSdServices::NeedService( SimpleString::EmptyString, GetOmiscidServiceDnsSdType(), eCallBack, eUserData );
00054     }
00055 };
